original_title: Crusade: The Life of Billy Graham
overview: It's the pioneering Christian evangelist as he's seldom been seen. This in-depth documentary chronicles testimony from his legions of followers and his spiritual message. The vidoeo includes an interview with host Randall Balmer, in which Graham fondly recalls his 50 years of spreading God's word. In addition, gospel singer George Beverly Shea and celebrities such as Johnny Cash attest to the reverend's insight and to the power of his teachings.
title: Crusade: The Life of Billy Graham
